entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 29 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 29 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
